content: cut a length of ribbon approximately twenty inches in length and thread through the holes created by round 30 add beads to the ends of the ribbons if desired post your images to instagram with #thedragonslayerbag and tag me @fisherfiberarts i can t wait to see what you create page 7 f i n d m e o n l i n e @fisherfiberarts fisherfiberarts fisherfiberarts questions email me rissa fisher at fisherfiberarts@gmail com fisher f i b e r a r t s thank you page 8
